Title: Textbook of Gynaecology
Author: ডি.সি দত্তা
Summary:
Summary Of The Book

Textbook Of Gynaecology is a great guide for practical knowledge on the basic principles of gynaecology and the intricacies of practising it. The operative steps used in gynaecological processes have been illustrated in detail with the help of examples. This fifth edition of the book has been thoroughly revised and is also updated from the previous versions. It also contains a chapter dedicated to the viva and practical examinations. The unique selling point of the book is that it contains the recommendations made by the American College, and the Royal College, London, incorporated in it. Illustrations with diagrams, sketches, and pictures make it easy to understand concepts explained therein.

Textbook Of Gynaecology contains chapters like Anatomy of the Pelvic Organs of the Female Body, Blood Vessels, Pelvic Organs Innervation, Lymphatic Drainage, how Gonads and Genetical Organs Develop, Congenital Malformation of the Female Genital Organs, Puberty: Normal and Abnormal Menopause, Menstruation, Neuroendocrinology with respect to Reproduction, and Examining Gynaecological Patients. It also contains detailed explanations on Infections in the Pelvic Area, Infections that are Sexually Transferred, Infections in an Individual Pelvic Organ, Disorders related to the Menstrual Cycles, Dysmenorrhoea, and Abnormal Menstrual Bleeding.

Moreover, it has chapters specially dedicated to Infertility, Displacement of the Uterus, Benign Lesions of Vulva, Vagina, Cervix, Ovary and Uterus, Endometriosis, Adenomyosis, Genital Malignancy, Premalignant Lesions, Genital Fistulae, Urinary Problems in the context of Gynaecology, Intersex, Injuries in the Genital Tract, Amenorrhoea, Radiotherapy and Contraception. The book also deals with treatments like Chemotherapy, Gene therapy, Immunotherapy, Hormones in Gynaecological Practice, Operative Gynaecology, problems related to Gynaecology from Birth up to Adolescence, Practical Gynaecology, and Endoscopic Surgery.

Self assessment questions and model papers have been included to let the students test themselves on their understanding of the concepts. This book is also helpful for the students of Homoeopathy, Nursing and Ayurveda.

Title: D. C. Datta Obstratics
Author: ডি. সি. দত্ত
Summary:
D. C. Dutta's Textbook of Obstetrics, authored by Hiralal Konar, is a fully revised book on the latest developments in obstetrics. The book covers many chapters on the subject which have been revised and elaborated. There are also a few new topics that have been included.

About Hiralal Konar

Dr. Hiralal Konar is a professor at the Calcutta National Medical College Hospital. He has been a Specialist Registrar in four different hospitals in the United Kingdom. He completed his MD course from PGI, Chandigarh, and has taught for both graduate and undergraduate courses in several universities in India.
